data.description:
Move/Walk/Go DIR -> 

This takes a DIR type argument and moves the player token on the map in that direction.

Quit -> 

Quit the current game and go back to the main menu

Travel DIR -> 

This takes a DIR type argument and moves the player token to the next map in that direction.

North/Up -> 

Direction argument, use when asked for DIR

East/Left -> 

Direction argument, use when asked for DIR

South/Down -> 

Direction argument, use when asked for DIR

West/Left -> 

Direction argument, use when asked for DIR
